p: The novel coronavirus (coronavirus disease 2019 [COVID-19]) outbreak began in Wuhan, China in December 2019 and has spread to at least 177 countries. 1 According to the World Health Organization (WHO) report, 2 as of 5 August 2020, COVID-19 has killed more than 696,147 people so far, with more than 18.3 million confirmed cases globally.
